name: Amrou Kithkin
oracle_text: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor_text: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.

name: Anaba Ancestor
oracle_text: {T}: Another target Minotaur creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Ancestors are the wisdom of the tribe and the soul of the Homelands. I am eternally in their debt."
—Taysir

name: Anaba Spirit Crafter
oracle_text: Minotaur creatures get +1/+0.
flavor_text:
"The Spirit Crafters sing of all our people. They sing of those lost, of those found, and of those who are yet to be."
—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

name: Astrolabe
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Barktooth Warbeard
flavor_text: He is devious and cunning, in both appearance and deed. Beware the Warbeard, for this brute bites as well as he barks!

name: Benthic Explorers
oracle_text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce.
flavor_text: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

name: Blood Lust
oracle_text: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

name: Bone Flute
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: After the Battle of Pitdown, Lady Ursnell fashioned the first such instrument out of Lord Ursnell's left leg.

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"O! call back yesterday, bid time return."
—William Shakespeare, King Richard the Second

name: Brilliant Plan
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text: At Red Cliffs, Kongming and Zhou Yu each wrote his plan for defeating Wei on the palm of his hand. They laughed as they both revealed the same word, "Fire."

name: Chain Lightning
oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Coal Golem
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice Coal Golem: Add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text:
"Three such creatures stood burning at the crest of the hill. Only seconds later, the fireball struck our front line."
—Lydia, Countess Brellis

name: Crimson Kobolds
flavor_text:
"Kobolds are harmless."
—Bearand the Bold, epitaph

name: D'Avenant Archer
oracle_text: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Avenant's archers are also trained as poets, so that each arrow is guided by a fragment of verse.

name: Demonic Torment
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Desperate Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Lieutenants dishonored, corpses carted home; The general raises troops again to take revenge."

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Elves of Deep Shadow
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text:
They are aberrations who have turned on everything we hold sacred. Let them be cast out."
—Ailheen, Speaker of the Council

name: Evil Presence
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.

name: Fellwar Stone
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
flavor_text:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, called the Pretender

name: Fevered Strength
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"The burst of strength brought on by this plague should not be mistaken for a sign of renewed health."
—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Fire Ambush
oracle_text: Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "With fire he broke the battle at Bowang . . . . Striking fear deep into Cao Cao's soul, thus Kongming scored a coup at his debut."

name: Fire Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Fire Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Brimstone marks this drake's territory. Unfortunately for travelers, all of the Burning Isles smell likewise.

name: Fire Sprites
oracle_text:
Flying
{G}, {T}: Add {R}.

name: Forced Retreat
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Leadership, not numbers, determines victory."
—A Wu commander, before his 5,000 troops forced 15,000 Wei troops to retreat from Ruxu

name: Force Spike
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

name: Ghostly Visit
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: Cao Cao was haunted to death by the ghosts of the empresses and other high courtiers he had murdered.

name: Ghosts of the Damned
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The voices of the dead ring in the heart long after they have faded from the ears.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Heal
oracle_text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Sometimes even the smallest boon can save a life."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Heavy Fog
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

name: Hunting Cheetah
oracle_text: Whenever Hunting Cheetah deals damage to an opponent, you may search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Hurloon Minotaur
flavor_text: The minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.

name: Immolation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.

name: Infuse
oracle_text:
Untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"The potential for change lies in all things. Know a thing's nature, know its possibilities, and know it anew."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

name: Jedit Ojanen
flavor_text: Mightiest of the cat warriors, Jedit Ojanen forsook the forests of his tribe and took service with the Robaran Mercenaries, rising through their ranks to lead them in the battle for Efrava.

name: Jerrard of the Closed Fist
flavor_text: Once, the order of the Closed Fist reached throughout the Kb'Briann Highlands. Now, Jerrard alone remains to uphold their standard.

name: Jungle Lion
oracle_text: Jungle Lion can't block.
flavor_text: The lion's only loyalty is to its hunger.

name: Kobolds of Kher Keep
flavor_text: Kher Keep is unique among fortresses: impervious to aerial assault but defenseless from the ground.

name: Kobold Taskmaster
oracle_text: Other Kobold creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor_text: The Taskmaster knows that there is no cure for the common Kobold.

name: Labyrinth Minotaur
oracle_text: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"I doubt any labyrinth minotaurs still live—but then again, we minotaurs are stubborn beings."
—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

name: Lady Orca
flavor_text:
"I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone."
—A Wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

name: Lesser Werewolf
oracle_text: {B}: If Lesser Werewolf's power is 1 or more, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn and put a -0/-1 counter on target creature blocking or blocked by Lesser Werewolf. Activate only during the declare blockers step.

name: Lightning Blow
oracle_text:
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"If you do it right, they'll never know what hit them."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Meng Huo's Horde
flavor_text: Through his allies, Meng Huo commanded several hundred thousand troops composed of cavalry, rattan-armored warriors, infantry, naked men with swords, and wild animals.

name: Misfortune's Gain
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor_text: The mourning families of commanders and generals were often given land, valuables, or money to compensate for their losses.

name: Peach Garden Oath
oracle_text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"We three, though of separate ancestry, join in brotherhood. . . . We dare not hope to be together always but hereby vow to die the selfsame day."
—Peach Garden Oath

name: Raging Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: The only thing worse than a minotaur with an axe is an angry minotaur with an axe.

name: Ramirez DePietro
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: Ramirez DePietro is a most flamboyant pirate. Be careful not to believe his tall tales, especially when you ask his age.

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then felt lifeless to the ground.

name: Scryb Sprites
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the scryb were very funny anymore.

name: Shu Cavalry
oracle_text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
flavor_text: In establishing the Shu kingdom, Liu Bei's forces fought against Ma Chao at Chengdu. Eventually, Ma Chao surrendered and became one of Liu Bei's Tiger Generals.

name: Shu Elite Companions
oracle_text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
flavor_text: Throughout the three kingdoms, important generals were often guarded by small groups of expert soldiers known as "elite companions."

name: Shu General
oracle_text: Vigilance; horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

name: Shu Soldier-Farmers
oracle_text: When Shu Soldier-Farmers enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: During Kongming's campaigns against the Wei, his Shu troops rotated from the battlefront to the fields every hundred days.

name: Sir Shandlar of Eberyn
flavor_text:
"Remember Sir Shandlar! Remember and stand firm!"
—rallying cry of the Eberyn militia

name: Sivitri Scarzam
flavor_text: Even the brave have cause to tremble at the sight of Sivitri Scarzam. Who else has tamed Scarzam's Dragon?

name: Slashing Tiger
oracle_text: Whenever Slashing Tiger becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Unless you enter the tiger's lair, you cannot get hold of the tiger's cubs."
—Sun Tzu, Art of War (trans. Giles)

name: Sol Grail
oracle_text:
As Sol Grail enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text:
"Look deep into the Grail, and see there what you desire most."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Spirit Shackle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

name: Spoils of Victory
oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.

name: Strategic Planning
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: "Plans evolved within the tent decide a victory 1,000 li away."

name: The Lady of the Mountain
flavor_text: Her given name has been lost in the mists of time. Legend says that her silent vigil will one day be ended by the one who, pure of heart and spirit, calls out that name again.

name: Three Visits
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Trying to meet a worthy man in the wrong way is as bad as closing the door on an invited guest."
—Mencius, a Chinese philosopher

name: Tobias Andrion
flavor_text: Administrator of the military state of Sheoltun, Tobias is the military right arm of the empire and the figurehead of its freedom.

name: Torsten Von Ursus
flavor_text: "How can you accuse me of evil? Though these deeds be unsavory, no one will argue: good shall follow from them."

name: Trip Wire
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with horsemanship.
flavor_text: Trip wire, hooked poles, and sunken pits were commonly used to unhorse riders during the Three Kingdoms period.

name: Wall of Light
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from black
flavor_text: As many attackers were dazzled by the wall's beauty as were halted by its force.

name: Wei Elite Companions
oracle_text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
flavor_text: Cao Cao was more concerned with capabilities than lineage. He excelled at recruiting and retaining men of talent to serve him.

name: Wei Infantry
flavor_text: Wei won the battle of Hefei when Zhang Liao defeated Sun Quan and then foiled a Wu scheme to incite rebellion.

name: Wei Strike Force
oracle_text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
flavor_text: At the battle of Chang'an, Ma Chao defeated the two generals Cao Cao sent to guard the pass but was forced to flee when Cao Cao's trickery turned his own ally against him.

name: Wu Elite Cavalry
oracle_text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
flavor_text: At the second battle of Ruxu, the brave Wu general Gan Ning raided Cao Cao's camp of 400,000 men with only 100 cavalry. Not a single man or horse was lost.

name: Wu Longbowman
oracle_text: {T}: Wu Longbowman deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Wu Warship
oracle_text: Wu Warship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: Both Wu and Wei warships patrolled the Yangtze River, the natural border between the two kingdoms.

name: Young Wei Recruits
oracle_text: Young Wei Recruits can't block.
flavor_text:
"To send the common people to war untrained is to throw them away."
—Confucius, The Analects (trans. Lau)
